vignette.name: Searching the Documentation
vignette.bodytext: You can search the Max documentation by using the Max documentation window. It allows you to perform searches and to explore documentation resources.

ul.li: Choose Max Help from the Help menu to display the documentation window.
Click in the Search field at upper right of the documentation window and enter the text you are looking for.
The results of your search will be returned, organized by types. The results displayed will include Max Object refpages, Max Tutorials, and Vignettes.
Use the disclosure triangles to hide or display categories to refine your search.
Click any item link to display your choice in the documentation window.

vignette.bodytext: Once you enter some search text, you can also see the results for any matching filenames in the file browser.

bluebox.bodytext: The documentation window also allows you to explore the online documentation by type.

ul.li: Choose Max Help from the Help menu to display the documentation window. You'll see tabs for Max objects, tutorials and vignettes.
To explore the documentation, click on a tab.
Use the disclosure triangles to show you the documentation contents in greater detail.
Click any item link to display your choice in the documentation window.
